education_text.0: Ping Fu was born in 1958 in      Nanjing,      China,                   where her father was a professor at the      Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA)Ping Fu was born in 1958 in      Nanjing,      China,                   where her father was a professor at the      Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA)In 1999, Fu relocated Geomagic from Illinois to the      Research Triangle Park Research Triangle Park,      North Carolina North Carolina
